duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent and efficient member service, handling merchandise returns, exchanges, pick-ups, and general customer services inquiries.
Support the application of club policies, procedures, and compliance, and strive for flawless execution in job functions.
Deliver service excellence through all points of contact and resolve member concerns in a courteous and timely manner.
Assist with Buy Online and Pick Up In Club (BOPIC) orders for members.
Maintain club policies and procedures and work as a team to deliver GOLD club standards daily.
Understand how to access and read production and/or financial performance reporting for the department and see the connection between consistent execution and positive impact on the business.
Regular, predictable, full attendance is an essential function of the job.
